already_have_account.Zh: 已經有帳號了嗎？點此登入
already_have_account.En: Already have an account? Login here.

see_document_instruction.Zh: 點此查看文件申請方式
see_document_instruction.En: See how to obtain this document

get_online.Zh: 線上申請、線上下載 PDF

consent_1.Zh: 我確認本次報名公托的嬰幼兒設籍於台中市，且滿２足月至２歲。
consent_1.En: The infant(s) applying for public daycares is/are residents of Taichung City and is older than 2 months old.

consent_2.Zh: 我確認嬰幼兒的父母或監護人，其中一方設籍於台中市。
consent_2.En: One of the parents/guardiens of infant(s) is a resident of Taichung City.

consent_3.Zh: 我確認最近一年家庭綜合所得淨額在121萬元以下（經稅捐稽徵機關核定綜合所得稅未達20%）
consent_3.En: The Net Consolidated Income of the family is less than 1,210,000 NTD. (The income tax bracket is lower than 20%)

same_household.En: Do you live in the same household?

single_or_multiple.En: Is the infant a singleton bitth?

medical_condition.En: Been diagnosed with special medical condition(s).

identity.Zh: 請選擇符合幼兒狀況的選項（可複選）
identity.En: Does the infant meet any of the following statuses?

daycare_reserved_spot.Zh: 您是否有回饋名額資格？
daycare_reserved_spot.En: Do you qualify for reserved spots?

public_reserved_spot.Zh: 是否為此{{DaycareLocation}}設籍居民之嬰幼兒
public_reserved_spot.En: Is the infant a child of this {{DaycareLocation}}'s resident?

school_reserved_spot.Zh: 是否為此{{DaycareLocation}}職員之嬰幼兒
school_reserved_spot.En: Is the infant a child of this {{DaycareLocation}}'s current employee?

employee_reserved_spot.Zh: 是否為此公托現職員工之子女
employee_reserved_spot.En: Is the infant a child of this daycare's current employee?

id_name.Zh: 請輸入與身分證明文件相符的完整姓名
id_name.En: Enter the name on your ROC documents

document_x_1.Zh: 為最近三個月申請之資料。
document_x_1.En: Was obtained no longer than 3 months before date of submission.

document_x_2.Zh: 戶口名簿的記事欄為「詳記」版本的全戶戶籍資料。
document_x_2.En: Has information of the entire household, and is the "detailed description" version.

document_x_3.Zh: 若為原住名身份，嬰幼兒的身分註記內需有原住名身分及族別內容。
document_x_3.En: Has information of aboriginal status registration if applicable.

document_x_4.Zh: 若為多份戶籍謄本，請合併成一份文件上傳。
document_x_4.En: When submitting multiple household registration, consolidate them into one single file.

document_y_1.En: Was obtained no longer than 1 year before date of submission.

document_a_1.Zh: 若您是社會住宅住戶，請上傳有效期限內的租賃契約書。

document_a_2.Zh: 若您是設置公托場地之學校編制內教職員，請上傳學校教職員證明。

document_c_1.Zh: 請提供綜合評估報告書全卷影本、診斷證明書影本或身心障礙證明影本。

document_c_2.Zh: 請確保文件為正式文件。

document_g_1.Zh: 可提供合法收出養媒合服務者與收養人及出養人簽訂之試養契約等相關證明文件。

document_g_2.Zh: 可提供法院家事聲請狀（聲請認可收養)之證明文件，並輔以與被收養人同住一地址之證明（如戶口名簿）。

document_g_3.Zh: 若為親屬間收養或繼親收養，可提供具法院公函文書（如家事法庭通知）或村、里長證明等相關證明文件。

document_h_1.Zh: 報名公托日期需於在職期間。

document_k_1.En: The expiration date has not yet passed.

document_l_1.Zh: 請確保為醫療機構之正式文件

return_reason_explane.Zh: 請說明退回報名的原因，方便申請人了解要怎麼修正。

challenged.Zh: 發展遲緩或持有身心障礙證明之嬰幼兒
challenged.En: Infant that is developmental, phsically, or mentally challenged

aboriginal.Zh: 具原住民身分之嬰幼兒

under_age.Zh: 未成年親職家庭之嬰幼兒
under_age.En: Parents are not of age yet

big_family.Zh: 父母戶內育有三名（含）以上子女家庭之嬰幼兒
big_family.En: Has 3 or more sibilings within direct family

immigrant.Zh: 監護人為單親一方尚未取得身分證的新住民
immigrant.En: Immigrant single parent who has not yet obtained Taiwanese National Identification.

already_somewhere_else.Zh: 已入托其他托嬰中心或托育家園

forfeit_consent.Zh: 我確認要放棄入托，並已了解送出後無法撤銷或更改。

disadvantage_5.Zh: 經濟弱勢兒童及少年生活扶助家庭
disadvantage_5.En: Qualified for Taichung city's economically disadvantaged support program.

fee_details.Zh: 詳情請見收退費參考表。

consent_1.Zh: 法院裁定收養認可前(試養階段)，準收養人設籍本市，該收養童得不受設籍限制。
consent_1.En: Infants in the adpption process does not need to meet this requirement.

consent_2.Zh: 單親一方為尚未取得國民身分證之新住民，不在此限。
consent_2.En: Single immigrant parent that has not yet obtained ROC citizenship do not need to meet this requirement.

phone.Zh: 可填手機號碼或市話號碼。
phone.En: You may use either cell phone number or land phone number.

medical_condition.Zh: 調查特殊疾病是為了讓公托掌握幼兒狀態，結果將不影響抽籤/候補資格。特殊疾病定義依福利部國健署公告罕見疾病名單為準。
medical_condition.En: We are surveying medical condition in order to understand better your infant's situation. It will not impact the results of raffling or waitlist.

identity.Zh: 各身分資格有不同的收托/候補順序。詳細原則請參考「臺中市政府社會局公設民營托嬰中心及社區公共托育家園收托計畫」
identity.En: Your identity will impact the priorities of raffling and waitlist. Please refer to Taichung City Hall's Public Daycare Instruction document for detailed information.

daycare_reserved_spot.Zh: 若您符合回饋名額資格，將可以優先抽籤/候補。詳細原則請參考「臺中市政府社會局公設民營托嬰中心及社區公共托育家園收托計畫」。
daycare_reserved_spot.En: If you are qulified for reserved spots, you will have priority raffling or in waitlist.

enter_order.Zh: 若報名抽籤，屆時可決定要同一籤次登記或個別以獨立籤次。若候補，將以此收托順序安排候補順序。
enter_order.En: In the ocassion of raffling, you will be present with the options of raffling all infants at once or separately. In the occasion of getting on waitlists, infants will be put on the waitlist by the order you enter here.

404.En: Oh no! The page is missing!

check_email.Zh: 請至信箱驗證email完成註冊
check_email.En: Please check your email inbox for verification email.

password_url_sent.En: A link to reset your password is sent to your email.

start_application_2.Zh: 填寫您和幼兒的基本資料，包含身分證字號、出生日期、地址、聯絡人等資訊。
start_application_2.En: Fill in information recording you and the infant(s), including ROC ID number, birthdate, address, emergency contacts, etc.

start_application_4.Zh: 一份報名可同時送往多間公托。
start_application_4.En: You will have the options to choose multiple daycares in your application.

start_application_6.Zh: 除非特殊身分資格，所有報名皆需上傳戶籍謄本及綜合所得稅核定通知書。報名平台將依據您的狀況告知您所需的文件。
start_application_6.En: Unless determined otherwise, you will need to upload Household Registration and Income Tax Assessment Notice to qualify for entering daycares. The system will navigate you through what you need to upload.

start_application_8.Zh: 報名審核後，將依照所申請的各公托狀況，安排抽籤或候補。
start_application_8.En: After your application submission is approved, the application will be put into raffle or waitlist depending on what the daycare you apply to is accepting.

can_pick_multiple.Zh: 可複選。目前選擇公托間數：
can_pick_multiple.En: You may select multiple daycare. Currenlty you have selected:

make_sure.Zh: 請確保資料符合以下規範：
make_sure.En: Please check that your documents fulfill the requrements as below:

status_submitted.Zh: 目前報名狀態為「已送出報名，尚未通過審查」，請儘速確認資料受理報名。若報名資料不齊或有誤，可退回報名，請申請人修改後重新送出。
status_submitted.En: The applcation status is "submitted but not yet approved". You may approve the application, or return the application if there are corrections that needs to be made.

status_raffle.Zh: 目前報名狀態為「等待抽籤」。
status_raffle.En: The application status is "Waiting for Raffle"

status_application_returned.Zh: 目前報名狀態為「報名被退回」。待申請人更新資料，重新送出報名後，可重新審核報名。排入後補的時間戳記將以重新送出的時間點為主。
status_application_returned.En: The application status is "Returned". You will be able to approve the application again after the applicant edit and resubmit the application. The application will be put into the waitlist based on the timestamp it's resubmitted.

status_waitlist_approved_1.Zh: 目前報名狀態為「候補中」，且目前有空額，可通知錄取。一但通知錄取，申請人將需於 2 日內確認報到意願，並於通知錄取的7日後報到。
status_waitlist_approved_1.En: The application status is "in waitlist". There are currently openings to accept this application. Once accepting the application, applicants will have to confirm registration within 2 days of acceptance, and enroll within 7 days of acceptance.

status_waitlist_approved_other.Zh: 目前報名狀態為「候補中」。若移除候補資格，系統將透過信件通知申請人，並把報名從候補清單中移除。

status_withdrew.Zh: 此報名已被撤回。若申請人欲重新報名，需於報名平台開始新的報名。
status_withdrew.En: This application status is "withdrew". Applicants will have to submit a new application if the would like to apply for daycares again.

status_accepted.Zh: 目前入托狀態為「尚未回覆報到意願」，系統將於回覆期限前每日寄送信件提醒。
status_accepted.En: This application status is "accepted but not registered yet". Applicants will receive one reminder email every day until response deadline.

status_registered.Zh: 目前入托狀態為「已確認報到意願」，請檢查資料後確認入托。若資料有誤，可退回請求重填。若取消錄取資格，申請人欲重新報名時，將需重新候補。
status_registered.En: The registration's status is "Registered". You may approve the registration to enroll the infant, or return the registration if there are corrections that need to be made.

status_registration_returned.Zh: 目前入托狀態為「報到被退回」。待申請人更新資料，重新送出報名後，可重新審核報到。
status_registration_returned.En: The registration's status is "Returned". You may approve the registration again after it is being resubmitted by the applicant.

status_forfeit.Zh: 目前入托狀態為「已放棄入托」。

status_rejected.Zh: 此報名不符合報名資格
status_rejected.En: This application did not qualify for public daycares.

status_enrolled.Zh: 此幼兒目前入托於此公托。

application_approval_explain.Zh: 可點選各報名資料查看詳細資訊，並審查成功送出的報名。
application_approval_explain.En: Please click on each applications for detailed information, and approve submitted applications.

application_waitlist_explain.Zh: 可點選各報名資料查看詳細資訊，並在空額的人數限制下通知錄取。
application_waitlist_explain.En: Please click on each applications for detailed information, and accept applications when there are openings.

application_removed_explain.Zh: 可點選各報名資料查看詳細資訊。
application_removed_explain.En: Please click on each applications for detailed information.

application_accepted_explain.Zh: 此為已通知錄取的名單。可點選各幼兒查看詳細資訊，並確認報到資料。
application_accepted_explain.En: This is the list of infants that are accepted into the daycare. Click to see infant's detailed information and approve registrations.

application_enrolled_explain.Zh: 此為目前入托的幼兒名單。可點選各幼兒查看詳細資訊。若辦理退托，將會開啟空額，屆時可通知其他候補錄取。
application_enrolled_explain.En: This is a list of currently enrolled infants. Click to see infant's detailed information. When graduating an infant, it will create openings to accept other infants into the daycare.

application_forfeited_explain.Zh: 此為放棄報到的幼兒名單。可點選各幼兒查看詳細資訊。
application_forfeited_explain.En: This is a list of infants that forfeited their daycare acceptance. Click to see infant's detailed information.

application_graduated_explain.Zh: 此為已退托的幼兒名單。可點選各幼兒查看詳細資訊。
application_graduated_explain.En: This is a list of infants that have graduated. Click to see infant's detailed information.

application_submitted_explain.Zh: 目前報名狀態為「已送出報名，尚未通過審查」，請儘速確認資料受理報名。若報名資料不齊或有誤，可退回報名，請申請人修改後重新送出。排入後補的時間戳記將以重新送出的時間點為主。
application_submitted_explain.En: The application status is "submitted but not yet approved", please review application. You may approve the application, or return the application if there are corrections that needs to be made. If there were to be resubmission of the application, the submission time will be based on the resubmission time.

approve_application_popup.Zh: 申請人將收到報名成功通知，並被排入候補名單或抽籤名單。
approve_application_popup.En: The applicant will recieve confirmation of application approval, and the application will be put into waitlist or raffle list.

application_waitlist_approved_explain.Zh: 目前報名狀態為「候補中」。若移除候補資格，系統將透過信件通知申請人，並把報名從候補清單中移除。
application_waitlist_approved_explain.En: The application status is "in waitlist". If an application is removed, the system will notify the applicant with email.

my_applications.Zh: 以下為您所有的報名。可編輯/刪除報名草稿，也可查看/撤回已送出的報名。
my_applications.En: These are all of your applications. You may edit, delete application drafts. You may also check and take back applications that are already submitted.

my_applications_blank.En: You haven't started any applications yet.

enroll_success_detail.Zh: 請於{{EnrollDate}}到{{DaycareName}}報到，屆時需簽署報到文件，建議可事先印出簽署，亦可報到時於公托簽署。
enroll_success_detail.En: Please arrive at {{DaycareName}}on{{EnrollDate}}. You will need have to fill in registration documents. In order to speed up the process, we would highly recomend to print and sign all documents in advance. However, you will also have the option to do so in person at the daycare on the day of enrollment.

no_wait.En: There is currently no wait on the waitlist.

C.Zh: 發展遲緩或持有身心障礙證明

F.Zh: 父母戶內育有三名（含）以上子女家庭

I.En: General family with multiple birth children

Y.Zh: 綜合所得稅核定通知書

A.Zh: 回饋名額身分證明文件

C.Zh: 發展遲緩或持有身心障礙證明
C.En: Developmental, phsically, or mentally challenged medical proof document
